desc: Humble Sea Brewing Co. is located in Santa Cruz, California. Humble Sea is world-renowned for their coastal "Foggy IPAs," decadent pastry and barrel-aged stouts, traditionally brewed pilsners and lagers, and barrel aged saisons.

layout.text:
Humble Sea Tavern New Hours
Mon-Tues 3-8pm
Wed-Fri 11-9pm
